thread.title: Costa Del Sol for General Rajendrasinhji Million
thread.title_full: Costa Del Sol for General Rajendrasinhji Million - Sports

author: Prakash Gosavi
title: Costa Del Sol for General Rajendrasinhji Million
text:
PUNE: A competitive ten-race card on Sunday will bring the curtain down on a very interesting and enjoyable Pune monsoon season 2015, in which 234 races were scheduled over 28 race days, and some amazing riding display by Trevor Patel and Dashrath Singh won the hearts of rail birds.
Costa Del Sol, winner of the Poonawalla Breeders' Multimillion at Mumbai and the FD Wadia Trophy at Pune, towers over all his rivals both on the strength of Dynamic Ratings as well as the inherent class factor. Although stretching over mile for the first time, the Pesi Shroff-trained three-year-old colt, carrying the silks of stockbroker Rakesh Jhunjhunwalla, is expected to complete what looks like a mere formality by winning the feature race.
First race at 12.30 pm.
Selections:
Assessed Plate (Class V; 1000m)
True Heir1, Make It Shine 2, Pezzonovante 3.

Star Shine Plate (For 3y, maidens; 1200m)
Aaron's 1, Wajood 2, Ice Cube Baby 3.
Shamu Chavan Trophy - Div II (For 5y&o, class IV; 1200m)
Alectar 1, Seven Seas 2, Matrioskha 3.
Democraticus Plate - Div II (class IV; 1400m)
Solange 1, Silvano 2, Aeolus Maximus 3.
Smt. Shantidevi Goyal Memorial Trophy - Div II (Class III; 1200m)
Alderley Edge 1, Fast Lady 2, Ainra 3.
General Rajendrasinhji Million (For 3y; 1600m)
Costa Del Sol 1, Korol 2, Phenomenal Memories 3.
Shamu Chavan Trophy - Div I (For 5y&o, class IV; 1200m)
Palace Girl 1, Rock The Turf 2, Sindbaad 3.
Irish Thoroughbred Marketing & Goffs R.W.I.T.C. Ltd Gold Cup (Grade 2) (For 4y&o; 2000m)
Booker Jones 1, Agostini 2, Shivalik Showers 3.
Smt. Shantidevi Goyal Memorial Trophy - Div I (Class III; 1200m) 
Indian Serenade 1, Desert Rage 2, Golden Belle 3.
Democraticus Plate - Div I (class IV; 1400m)
B Fifty Two 1, Sea Lagoon 2, Romano 3.
Recommendations
Best bet: Costa Del Sol (6-1)
Good bet: Solange (4-10)
Chance bet: Indian Serenade (9-11)
Upset: Moneywise (10-1)
Today's pools
Super jackpot pool: 5,6,7,8,9,10 
Jackpot pool: I - 3,4,5,6,7; II - 6,7,8,9,10
Treble pool: I - 4,5,6; II - 7,8,9; III - 8,9,10 
Tanala pool: All races.
